titleStmt.title: A declaration by Congregationall societies in, and about the city of London; as well of those commonly called Anabaptists, as others. In way of vindication of themselves. Touching 1. Liberty, 2. Magistracy, 3. Propriety, 4. Polygamie. Wherein their judgments, concerning the particulars mentioned are tendred to consideration, to prevent mis-understanding.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Simmons for Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
